error.api_password: Invalid authentication, use either API Key or Password.

user.description:
Enter the IP address of your Daikin AC.
If your device is set up with a password or API-key, please use that, in all other cases leave the fields blank.
user.title: Configure Daikin AC

temperature_out_of_range.message: Temperature {temperature}°C is outside the supported range ({min_temp}°C - {max_temp}°C).

zone_hvac_read_only.message: Zone HVAC mode is controlled by the main climate entity.

zone_inactive.message: Zone {zone_id} is not active. Enable the zone on your Daikin device first.

zone_missing.message: Zone {zone_id} does not exist. Available zones are 0-{max_zone}.

zone_parameters_unavailable.message: This device does not expose the required zone temperature parameters.

zone_set_failed.message: Failed to set zone temperature. The device may not support this operation.

zone_temperature_missing.message: Provide a temperature value when adjusting a zone.
